publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2206 Trish Godman: Abolition of Tolls on Erskine Bridge—That the Parliament considers that the abolition of the tolls on the Erskine Bridge would help to relieve congestion and pollution problems on other river crossings; further considers that the local economies on either side of the Clyde would be likely to benefit, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to move quickly to complete the work needed so that the tolls on the bridge can be removed. Supported by: Des McNulty*, Jackie Baillie*

S2M-2206 Trish Godman: Abolition of Tolls on Erskine Bridge—That the Parliament considers that the abolition of the tolls on the Erskine Bridge would help to relieve congestion and pollution problems on other river crossings; further considers that the local economies on either side of the Clyde would be likely to benefit, and therefore urges the Scottish Executive to move quickly to complete the work needed so that the tolls on the bridge can be removed. Supported by: Des McNulty, Jackie Baillie
S2M-2206 Abolition of Tolls on Erskine Bridge (lodged on 22 December 2004) Ms Sandra White*
S2M-2206 Abolition of Tolls on Erskine Bridge (lodged on 22 December 2004) John Swinburne*
S2M-2206 Abolition of Tolls on Erskine Bridge (lodged on 22 December 2004) Murray Tosh*
